name: Lorelei
info: This cool beauty who uses Ice-type Pokémon is one of the Elite Four. She likes cute things and has many plushies at home.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.effect: Never misses during a hailstorm. Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: Brace Yourself!
moves.effect: The smaller the user’s percentage of remaining HP, the more this move raises its Defense (can be raised by up to 4 stat ranks maximum). Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

syncMove.name: Freezing Terror Blizzard
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases when the target is frozen.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.
